Time Will Tell API Docs

1. Execute a Command

POST /cmd

Execute a specific command from the list of allowed commands.

Headers:

  • Content-Type: Must be application/json

Request Body:

{
    "cmd": "command_name"
}

Available Commands:

  • get_time.12: Get current time in 12-hour format with AM/PM.
  • get_time.24: Get current time in 24-hour format.
  • get_date: Get current date.
  • get_time_date: Get current date and time in 12-hour format.
  • get_help: Get a list of available commands.
  • helpful_hint: Receive a helpful hint.

Example Request:

curl -X POST http://localhost:8000/cmd \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -d '{"cmd": "get_time.12"}'

Example Response:

{
    "current_time_12hr": "03:45:12 PM"
}

2. Get Available Commands

GET /get-options

Retrieve a list of all available commands.

Headers:

  • Content-Type: Must be application/json

Example Request:

curl -X GET http://localhost:8000/get-options \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json"

Example Response:

{
    "allowed_commands": [
        "get_time.12",
        "get_time.24",
        "get_date",
        "get_time_date",
        "get_help",
        "helpful_hint"
    ]
}
